title: Netflix will acquire Warner Bros., gaming segment and HBO
description: Netflix and Warner Bros. Discovery announced an agreement on Friday that will see the streaming giant acquire Warner Bros. As part of the deal, Netflix will get Warner Bros.’ film and TV studios, including HBO Max and HBO, as well as Warner Bros. Games. The d…
